Sentence.value: When you have extra cholesterol in your blood, it builds up inside the walls of your arteries (blood vessels), including the ones that go to your heart.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: When you have extra [[cholesterol|C0008377]] in your [[blood|C0005767]], it builds up inside the walls of your arteries (blood vessels), including the ones that go to your heart.

Sentence.value: Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you take care of your cholesterol.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Below are some questions you may want to ask your [[health care provider|C0018724]] to help you take care of your [[cholesterol|C0008377]].
